about_the_game:
Block Catching is a childhood game of catching but it takes place in a building with multiple levels. In this game you will be playing with friends, and one of them is a catcher.

A group of friends explores a haunted building on a dare, only to get involved in a game of being chased by something not human.

In The Game

  • Different terrifying Catchers to choose from.
  • Every different Catcher has an ability unique to itself.
  • Run, hide, take the elevator...Do not get caught. Do everything to survive the game of Block Catching, together with your friends.

From The Creator

Hi, I'm Justus Yew, the game creator of Block Catching. Block Catching is inspired by a local childhood catching game that died out as time passed, and I want our players to be able to experience the fun and excitement that we once had during our younger days.

In my game, Block Catching, there will be unique elements implemented into the game to make it more fun. Hopefully we will be able to showcase some of these 'elements' as soon as they are ready!

content_descriptors.notes: Block Catching contains some mature content that might not be appropriate for all ages.

name: Block Catching

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: An online game of block catching with a twist. The catcher is not your friend.
